channel.title: [508] Problem with hitting only owner [508]
channel.description:
hey im the owner of my server im about to put on the status but im doing pics and i was doing a nice d claw spec which worked i hit 3 zeros and a 194 and 1hit k0ed my opponent i tried 3 more times all 1 hit k0 so i tried a different weapon 1 hit k0. i made a new acc got a steel scimmy and hit a 1 so its just me on the owner account. is there anyway to fix this so i just hit like as if i had 99 strength 99 def and 99 attack (which i do because im max'ed) it coulda been a command i dont know! if it was 317 i woulda checked the characters folder then see if there was something like always1hitk0=1 but these are .dat files!
help !

item.title: [508] Problem with hitting only owner [508]
item.dc:creator: @Andy89898 Andy89898
item.description:
@Andy89898 wrote:

yes but its a .dat file and in game my str is like 99/99

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Problem with hitting only owner [508]
item.dc:creator: @towriss towriss
item.description:
@towriss wrote:

go into saved games folder and see what your str lvl is. could say like 9999/99 or 1245/99

Read full topic
